title: Atlantis Stay in the 'Hawaii of China' with Exclusive Club Access
description: Experience the tropical 'Hawaii of China' at the beachfront Atlantis Sanya, sister property of the famed Atlantis, The Palm in Dubai. Escape reality and enter the majestic Lost City of Atlantis overlooking the azure waters of the South China Sea. Enjoy unlimited entry to the Aquaventure Waterpark and Lost Chambers Aquarium and exclusive access to the 18th-floor or 48th-floor Imperial Club Lounge and all its benefits, including daily breakfast, daily afternoon tea, evening happy-hour cocktails and all-day tea, coffee and refreshments. Plus, enjoy 20% off dolphin, sea lion and beluga encounters. Great for families: up to two kids aged 11 years and under stay free with all inclusions.
offer_address: North Haitang Bei Road, Sanya, China, 572013

vendor_name: Grand Hyatt Sanya Haitang Bay Resort and Spa
title: Beachfront Stay in ‘The Hawaii of China’ with Exclusive Club Access
description: Laze on the tropical beachfront of China’s spectacular Hainan Island and enjoy exclusive access to the five-star Grand Club Lounge and all its perks at Grand Hyatt Sanya Haitang Bay Resort and Spa. Sanya has been named ‘the Hawaii of China’ and you’ll soon understand why, with its stunning beaches, pristine white sands and beautiful ambience. Enjoy direct golden sand-beach access with Grand Club Lounge benefits including decadent daily buffet breakfast, sunset cocktail happy hour, daily afternoon tea, a guaranteed 1pm late checkout and much more.
location_description: Grand Hyatt Sanya Haitang Bay Resort & Spa
offer_address: 68 Haitang North Road, Haitang Bay Sanya, 572013 China

title: Grand Opening: Atlantis Sanya with Exclusive Club Access
description: Be among the first to escape to China’s brand-new Atlantis (sister property of the famed Atlantis the Palm in Dubai) in the beachfront resort town of Sanya. Escape reality and enter the majestic Lost City of Atlantis overlooking the azure waters of the South China Sea. Enjoy unlimited access to the Aquaventure Waterpark and Lost Chambers Aquarium and exclusive access to the 18th-floor or 48th-floor Imperial Club Lounge and all its benefits including daily breakfast, daily afternoon tea, evening happy hour cocktails and all-day tea coffee and refreshments. Plus enjoy access to Miniversity for kids and teens and complimentary Wi-Fi. Bring the kids along: two kids 11 years and under stay free.
offer_address: North Haitang Bei Road, Sanya, China, 572013

vendor_name: Grand Hyatt Sanya Haitang Bay Resort and Spa
title: Grand Hyatt Island Escape in China
description: Laze on the tropical beachfront of China’s spectacular Hainan Island and enjoy exclusive access to the five-star Grand Club Lounge and all its perks at Grand Hyatt Sanya Haitang Bay Resort and Spa. Enjoy direct golden sand-beach access with decadent daily buffet breakfast, sunset cocktail happy hour, daily afternoon tea, kid’s club access and much more. Plus up to two kids stay free!
location_description: Grand Hyatt Sanya Haitang Bay Resort and Spa - OLD
offer_address: 68 Haitang North Road, Haitang Bay  Sanya, , 572013 China

vendor_name: Crowne Plaza Sanya Haitang Bay Resort
title: Haitang Bay Bliss with Upscale Alfresco Bar & Restaurant
description: Discover ocean views for days from Crowne Plaza Sanya Haitang Bay Resort, an IHG Hotel, a modern escape by the South China Sea. There are four restaurants to choose from during your stay; bounce between south-east Asian and regional Chinese buffet, upscale Cantonese cuisine, a family fun dining centre and alfresco dining. In your downtime, take a dip in the two swimming pools or work up a sweat in the 24/7 fitness centre positioned in front of magnificent ocean panoramas.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Sanya Haitang Bay Resort, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 98 North Haitang Road, Haitang Bay, Sanya 572013, China

title: China Beachside Escape with Aquarium Restaurant
description: Embraced by verdant gardens, InterContinental Sanya Haitang Bay Resort, an IHG Hotel, is a beachside tropical escape that brings the ocean to you. A submarine seafood selection awaits at Aqua restaurant, where alarge seawater aquarium tunnel and a unique fine dining experience combine. Work up a sweat at the fitness centre, hit the beach for some surf and sand, indulge in shopping at boutiques and shopping malls, or retire to a stylish and comfortable guest room or suite for a peaceful night's sleep.
location_description: InterContinental Sanya Haitang Bay Resort, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 128 North Haitang Road, Haitang Bay, Sanya, 572013, China

title: Tranquil Coastal China Haven with Glorious Ocean Views, Whirlpool & Authentic Dining
description: Feel the sea breeze in your hair and experience pure coastal relaxation at Holiday Inn Resort Sanya Bay, an IHG Hotel - a tropical oasis waiting to be enjoyed. The recently modernised space is sleek in style and comforting in the laid-back atmosphere. Splash around in the nearby beaches, explore the vibrant town, or hang out by the pool all day long. Indulge in authentic Chinese fare at one of the resort’s three restaurants while assured your kids are having fun in the kid’s club and jungle zone.
location_description: Holiday Inn Resort Sanya Bay, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 207 Sanya Bay Road, Tianya District, Sanya, HA  572000, China

title: Sanya Tropical City Centre Escape 10 Minutes from Dadonghai Beach
description: A tropical oasis with sapphire seaside views, the Crowne Plaza Sanya City Center, an IHG Hotel, boasts an enviable location opposite Yulan Harbour in the heart of China's premier resort town. Indulge in rejuvenating treatments at the Atapan Spa or float in the serene rooftop pool. Take the short trip to Dadonghai Beach, admire the hilltop views of Luhuitou Park or visit the vibrant Visun Bar Street for a taste of Sanya's vibrant nightlife.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Sanya City Center, an IHG Hotel

title: Sanya Bay Beachfront Resort with Magnificent Swimming Pool
description: Picturesque coastlines and palm-fringed beaches await at Crowne Plaza Resort Sanya Bay, an IHG Hotel, a glamorous gateway to the turquoise tides of the South China Sea. Attain peak relaxation as you float in the magnificent pool or bask on sun loungers with a colourful cocktail in hand. As the sun goes down, watch the waves with sand between your toes, sample Cantonese delicacies at Shan Hai Lou restaurant or venture out to get your heart racing at the Love World amusement park.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Resort Sanya Bay, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 228 Sanya Bay Road, Sanya 572000, China

title: Five-Star Eco-Friendly Sanya China InterContinental Island Escape
description: Experience high-end opulence and renowned elegance at the lavish InterContinental Sanya Resort - IHGl, ideally located beachfront overlooking the South China Sea. Surrounded by white sand shores lapped by turquoise waters, this elegant oasis offers a palatial escape with ocean views. Part of the globally recognised InterContinental brand, the eco-friendly resort features extensive water features, lush gardens, four swimming pools, lavish spa, onsite fitness centre and five restaurants and bars.
offer_address: No.128, North Haitang Road,, Haitang Bay, Sanya, China, 572013
